title: Miniature Portrait of Marie Joseph Paul Lafayete (Marquis De Lafayette) (1757-1834)
medium: watercolor on ivory; gilt wood frame
provenance_text:
Charles Manigault, Charleston, SC [1]; by descent to Mrs. Hawkins K. Jenkins, his grand daughter; Possibly purchased by William MacBeth, New York, NY [2]; Possibly purchased by William MacBeth, New York, NY; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, June 10, 1916; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] Charles Manigault was a friend of Lafayette. [2] After mentioning the transfer to Mrs. Hawkins K. Jenkins, the documentation says "from whom it was bought" and that likely implies that William MacBeth purchased this item directly from her.
